Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 115 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to be
on pins and needles let's find out what
it means and how you can use it in your
daily conversation to be on pins and
needles there are times when you are
worried and excited about something that
may or may not happen the idiom to be on
pins and needles basically means to be
nervous worried and excited about
something that may happen you can use
this idiom when you want to express that
you are tensed as you feel something bad
may happen so you nervously wait to see
what is going to happen your anxiety
levels are very high you are unable to
settle and calm your mind as you are
waiting for something very important for
example there had been a room there in
your office that someone was going to
get fired but no one knew who it would
be so the whole office was on pins and
needles all day
that means all were tensed and nervous
as they felt something bad was about to
happen okay now you know what this idiom
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how to use it in your
daily conversation example one Elsie was
on pins and needles while receiving her
test results from her teacher example
Till amy was on pins and needles as she
was to deliver her first child very soon
[Music]
example three Shawn was on pins and
needles when he received an email about
his suspension from his University
example 4
Williams was on pins and needles as he
was about to dive for the first time
example 5 being full of mixed emotions
on her wedding day
Elizabeth was on pins and needles just
before the ceremony example 6
Linda consoled her friend when she was
on pins and needles while waiting for
her father's call confirming his safe
arrival example 7 at the appraisal
meeting Nancy was on pins and needles
when she was questioned about her
performance example 8 even though richer
is a bubbly child she is always on pins
and needles when she has to take an
injection example 9 being a suspicious
wife Kelly is always on pins and needles
when she sees her husband texting all
the time that's the end of today's

on pins and needles kindly share your
